555 A.2d 1209
Ralph R. RIEHL, Jr., Appellant v. Rendulic, the Pennsylvania Department of Environmental Resources and thé United States Environmental Protection Agency.

Argued March 9, 1989.
Filed March 21, 1989.
Ralph R. Riehl, III, Riehl & Bozza, Erie, for appellant.
